
Two users generated RSA keys but accidentally used the same prime. Can you exploit this to recover the flag from 977428647837148448406884131080906594045425105274630393366949309718795694500388690313122583996287978180027517349236139437493527049758814783171150594025502935347115901056424406086194373095033421185054727348749535825453139588816363169?


The flag format is flag{...}
n=1030863817498621324427407099678585554791640942513027604005347467413265812165899300142803064553382654949165741653902066750371405415829806527639593601775818093345027966243903925077499188831394363420842268536715950141033813974986684171, n2=1270091922509580871040009935991369679215749789470035360527069603063681767694889305272422863162129289034400472660143959362086490360434681251897806980449541867728308382865917002704561713515817457249508148498968578499179735962602131247, e=893703177401224336801835754053086698338525427443018251208448516823507075854886646091814559807709125658533989369652021484399483556256716340381146943545798615189864851736977457356026693828432534857293568911344648873693578330307949493

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{0a69q8em}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 977428647837148448406884131080906594045425105274630393366949309718795694500388690313122583996287978180027517349236139437493527049758814783171150594025502935347115901056424406086194373095033421185054727348749535825453139588816363169
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1030863817498621324427407099678585554791640942513027604005347467413265812165899300142803064553382654949165741653902066750371405415829806527639593601775818093345027966243903925077499188831394363420842268536715950141033813974986684171, n2=1270091922509580871040009935991369679215749789470035360527069603063681767694889305272422863162129289034400472660143959362086490360434681251897806980449541867728308382865917002704561713515817457249508148498968578499179735962602131247, e=893703177401224336801835754053086698338525427443018251208448516823507075854886646091814559807709125658533989369652021484399483556256716340381146943545798615189864851736977457356026693828432534857293568911344648873693578330307949493
extra_info: p=34429026404803984470216332414801611130202885845200030709653984716202190236694853390324833482261770743812243388763377, q=29941706900976492017890661074063643805194222616815598118062442480500943365844371543650795000948089008754891578094523, q2=36890149247216620884534177924565058763138125444051065751820322692621520328998429538432333823044659748125221472673311, φ(n)=1030863817498621324427407099678585554791640942513027604005347467413265812165899300142803064553382654949165741653902002379638099635353318420646104736520882696236565950615076208650302485697791824195908292908232740281281246840019826272, φ(n2)=1270091922509580871040009935991369679215749789470035360527069603063681767694889305272422863162129289034400472660143888042910838339829326501387467613779648526717019131769455528397152889805251763966579391331663272068687798497740694560
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
